title: Late Larva
description: Larva is a cherry blossom tree. His dream is to grow a lot of flowers for the annual spring festival as he has always wanted to make others happy. As the festival begins, he worries as he has yet to produce any of his beautiful flowers. As the festival comes to an end, Larva learns a valuable lesson which can be passed on to readers of all ages.
author: Josh Prigge
